title: PhD-student Fiber optics and predictable physical models towards better thermal characterization of electric motors
field: Analysis, Applied Mathematics, Electrical Engineering, Electronics, Engineering Physics, and 2 moreMechanical Engineering,Mechatronics
job_description: Ghent University is a top 100 university worldwide and one of the major universities in Belgium, with more than 44,000 students and 15,000 staff members. At the department of Electromechanical, Systems and Metal Engineering (ESME), the multiphysics modeling of mechatronic systems where physical models are combined with measured data is an important research topic.
employer_description: Ghent University is one of the top 100 universities in the Dutch language area, with more than 44,000 students and 15,000 staff members.
